name: Lavender Fields
description: Embrace the calming scent of lavender fields in full bloom. Made with real lavender buds and essential oils, this candle brings the tranquil beauty of Provence into your home.

name: Tropical Paradise
description: A lush, fruity scent that transports you to a tropical paradise. Infused with real pieces of dried mango and coconut, this candle is your escape to the beaches of Thailand.

name: Arctic Whisper
description: Cool and crisp as the Arctic air. This refreshing scent, with hints of peppermint and eucalyptus, encapsulates the essence of an Arctic breeze.

name: Desert Dusk
description: Experience the warmth and mystery of a desert at dusk. With notes of sandalwood and cactus flower, this candle captures the serene beauty of the desert landscape.

name: Mountain Retreat
description: Breathe in the crisp, clean air of the mountains. This candle features a blend of cedarwood and pine, embodying the peaceful solitude of a mountain retreat.

name: Ocean Breeze
description: Capture the essence of the ocean with this refreshing scent. Notes of sea salt and kelp blend with a hint of citrus, reminiscent of a breezy day at the shore.

name: Autumn Harvest
description: Embrace the cozy warmth of autumn with this candle. With scents of pumpkin, cinnamon, and nutmeg, it's like the essence of fall encapsulated in wax.

name: Midnight Jasmine
description: Let the intoxicating scent of jasmine under the moonlight enchant your senses. This floral masterpiece brings the allure of a midnight garden into your home.

name: Herbal Retreat
description: Find your inner peace with this calming blend of lavender, chamomile, and sage. Perfect for meditation or unwinding after a long day.

name: Citrus Grove
description: Energize your space with the zesty and refreshing scent of a citrus grove at dawn. Blends of lemon, orange, and grapefruit awaken the senses and brighten your mood.
